item.ptxt: Use the same procedures for the LH side and RH side.
The procedures listed below are for the RH side.
A bolt without a torque specification is shown in the standard bolt chart (See page ).

s2.ptxt: Apply Primer G to the glass where the clip will be installed.

atten4.ptxt: If primer is applied to an area that is not specified, wipe off the primer with white gasoline before it dries.

item.ptxt: Allow the primer to dry for 3 minutes or more.
Do not apply too much primer.

s2.ptxt: Install 4 new clips onto the glass's dot marks, as shown in the illustration.
Apply Primer G to the glass where the clip will be installed.

atten4.ptxt: If primer is applied to an area that is not specified, wipe off the primer with white gasoline before it dries.

item.ptxt: Allow the primer to dry for 3 minutes or more.
Do not apply too much primer.

s2.ptxt: Install the moulding.
Using a brush or sponge, apply primer M to the exposed part of the vehicle body.

item.ptxt: Allow the primer coating to dry for 3 minutes or more.
Do not apply too much primer.

s2.ptxt: Using a brush or sponge, apply primer G to the contact surface of the glass.

atten4.ptxt: If primer is applied to an area that is specified, wipe off the primer with white gasoline before it dries.

item.ptxt: Allow the primer to dry for 3 minutes or more.
Do not apply too much primer.

s2.ptxt: Apply adhesive to the quarter window glass.

specitem.ptxt: Toyota Genuine Windshield Glass Adhesive or Equivalent

s3.ptxt: Cut off the tip of the cartridge nozzle as shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: After cutting off the tip, use all adhesive within the time written in the table below.

s3.ptxt: Load the sealer gun with the cartridge.
Apply adhesive to the quarter window glass as shown in the illustration.

s2.ptxt: Install the quarter window glass to the vehicle body.

s3.ptxt: Hold the quarter window glass in place securely with protective tape or equivalent until the adhesive hardens.

item.ptxt: Allow the primer coating to dry for 3 minutes or more.
Check that the clips are attached to the body correctly.
Check the clearance between the body and glass.

s3.ptxt: Lightly press the front surface of the glass to ensure a close fit.
Using a scraper, remove any excess or protruding adhesive.

atten4.ptxt: Apply adhesive onto the glass rim.

atten3.ptxt: Do not drive the vehicle within the time written in the table below.

entry.ptxt: Minimum time prior to driving vehicle

s2.ptxt: Place the roof headlining into the vehicle as shown in the illustration.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the roof headlining when placing it.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 fasteners to install the roof headlining.
Install the 8 clips.
Connect the connectors and attach the 5 clamps to the front pillar.

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure for all assist grips.

s2.ptxt: Install the assist grip with the 2 screws.
Attach the 4 claws and close the 2 covers.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL ROOF SIDE INNER UPPER GARNISH RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.
Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL QUARTER INSIDE TRIM BOARD RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws, 8 clips and 2 guides to install the quarter inside trim board.
Install the clip.
Connect the rear No. 1 seat outer belt floor anchor with the bolt.
Connect the rear No. 2 seat outer belt floor anchor with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT REAR NO. 2 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER RH

s2.ptxt: Connect the seat belt's floor anchor with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT REAR NO.1 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER RH

s2.ptxt: Connect the seat belt's floor anchor with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR DOOR OPENING TRIM WEATHERSTRIP RH
INSTALL REAR DOOR SCUFF PLATE RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 6 clips and 4 claws to install the back door scuff plate.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SEAT ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Fully tilt the seatback forward.
Place the seat onto the lock striker.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the vehicle body.

s2.ptxt: Install the bolt on the rear side of the seat.
Install the bolt on the front side of the seat.
Fully lock the seat to the lock striker.

atten4.ptxt: Confirm that the seat is firmly locked to the lock striker.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT REAR BRACKET COVER RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the rear seat front bracket cover RH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT FRONT BRACKET COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Fully tilt the seatback forward.
Remove the screw.
Pull the bracket cover in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to detach the claw and remove the bracket cover.
Conduct a leak test after the adhesive has completely hardened.
Seal any leaks with auto glass sealer.
